- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Code refactoring
- [ ] Performance improvement
- [ ] Test addition/improvement

## Checklist

Before submitting, please check that you have:

- [ ] Read the [CONTRIBUTING.md](../CONTRIBUTING.md) guidelines
- [ ] Code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] Self-review of code performed
- [ ] Comments added for complex logic
- [ ] Documentation updated (README, API docs, etc.)
- [ ] No new warnings generated
- [ ] Tests added/updated for new features or bug fixes
- [ ] All tests pass locally
- [ ] No console.log() or debugging statements left in code
- [ ] Commit messages follow conventional format
- [ ] Branch is up to date with main

## Security

- [ ] This PR does not introduce security vulnerabilities
- [ ] Input validation is properly handled
- [ ] No sensitive data (API keys, passwords) in code
- [ ] SQL injection prevention verified (prepared statements used)
- [ ] XSS prevention verified (output sanitization)
